data.text: @LotusBlossom___ I agree, but we don’t know who isn’t wearing it because they can’t, or not wearing it because they don’t want to. I’m just pointing out that it’s been more common around here lately

@gnomegrown81 @FuzzyLeoLegault @moneygraeber @CovidKfla @NewsYgk @KFLAPH The 40% increase was 3rd quarter 2021 vs 3rd quarter 2019.

The insurance executive who pointed this out put the blame on COVID.

Those numbers are real, but they are deaths of the unvaccinated in the delta wave.

https://t.co/ZANjKxftGO

@gnomegrown81 @FuzzyLeoLegault @moneygraeber @CovidKfla @NewsYgk @KFLAPH You realize that a 3% death rate would have killed 7.6 million Americans. That's more than all causes-of-death in the US for 2020 & 2021 combined.

Maybe you should understand what the report actually said.
@venditti_diana @CovidKfla @KFLAPH Oh I never wear a mask, it doesn't do anything...
@CovidKfla @NewsYgk @KFLAPH Hypothetical variants "which are brutal and deadly" 🤣🤣🤣🤣

@moneygraeber @CovidKfla @NewsYgk @KFLAPH If you think these facts suck (there are alternative sources of entertainment &/or “facts” you might prefer...), you certainly don’t need to look at it/read it here, and then… comment on it.
This could be construed as bullying. Shame.

Be well everyone!

😷💉👍🏼
